review: Nice media box.Obviously amazon centric. Missing a few of my favorite apps, foxnow&fxnow.;Player sling TV rock solid. Amazon prime super fast and nice UI. Playing with Android games etc is pretty cool though.Unfortunately the interface is kinda cluttered. And it's a little laggy. However very promising. If I see a regular fire TV on sale, I'm likely to pick it up. Just feels a little underpowered when compared to the possibilities , especially running you don't normally see on a media stick.I'm currently using a roku 1, stick and 3, Chromecast and Intel compute stick. And the fire stick is tied with the roku 3 got my favorite. Full-size TV might be enough to unseat the roku 3. But for the dollar I think the fire stick is the best media player deal on the market
